recommendations: LinkedIn User ‚ÄúHarshit, A good leader and marketing consultant. I met him while working at Mother's recipe. I admire the way he analyses and find out solutions for any situation. He never hesitates to take the initiative for action and implement it without any delay. I enjoyed the time while working with him.‚Äù

Arihant Sett ‚ÄúHarshit and I worked together at ZS Associates in 2016. As a team mate, he was dedicated, hard working and extremely detail oriented. He was an integral member of the Operations team and spearheaded numerous complicated projects for one of the large pharmaceutical companies in the world. What impressed me most about Harshit was his exceptional work ethic. He is an incredibly fast learner who remains calm in the toughest of times. His positive attitude, great communication skills and unmatched professionalism would make him an asset to any organization. Harshit was an absolute joy to work with and I hope I get the chance to work with him again.‚Äù
projects: [{"title":"Comienzo","start_date":"Feb 2016","end_date":"Mar 2016","description":"Today, people are getting into all different fields. They like to explore other dances, languages, culture or they are willing to learn more so as to improve their own skills like joining writing classes or improving their communication skills or even seeking for some classes so as to crack examinations. With this willingness to know something new, there comes a need for various professional classes. Over the time, various different professional classes have come up offering courses from all around the world, but still there is a problem that is needed to be sorted out that is the knowledge about the existence of such classes is still not available that much. It's like these classes are there but still you cannot find them on the map. Most of these classes get their students on referral basis only and have zero or very less presence online. These classes may go for online marketing but they are not looking for students at that big scale and thus even their small online presence becomes useless. For the public, they remain unaware of any such classes in their nearby area and thus they also fail to learn something new. Comienzo will aim at providing an online platform to such classes where they can list themselves, and then the users may access that information so as to reach out to these classes. Information regarding the operating days and costs could be found out on the website. Comienzo will help bridge the marketing gap between classes and students."},{}]
